products.title: Stockholm Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Stockholm Solar Yellow Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £7.39 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This bright, sunny, yellow roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This yellow roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!

products.title: Stirlo Primrose Yellow
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Primrose Yellow Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Primrose Yellow Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Palate Barley Gold Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palate Barley Gold Roller Blind
products.productdescription: The Palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Amor Yellow Submarine Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Yellow Submarine Roller Blind. Bring the colour of sunshine into your home! A 100% blackout fabric means no matter how much it rains you'll always be seeing that bright yellow. Made to measure roller blinds.
products.productdescription: Make a statement in your home with the vibrant yellow colour in the Amor Yellow Submarine. This blind is sure to add some zing to your interior and with a name like ‘Yellow Submarine’ you’ll be singing your way round your home before you know it. This is a blackout fabric and is perfect for bedrooms as it will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.metadescription: The yellow and gold tones to the Andes Machu Gold make this blind a real showstopper. Perfect for adding colour and style to your window, this print is delicate yet bold with it's intricate print that is best seen close up.
products.productdescription: The yellow and gold tones to the Andes Machu Gold make this blind a real showstopper.
